name: thinking of my mother
description:
blue belongs to my mother, my mother who had child after child in search of a precious, perfect son. blue belongs to my mother, who didn't realize she'd had a son from the very beginning of motherhood. blue belongs to my mother, my mother who still says she has three daughters and one son, instead of two sons and two daughters.

blue belongs to my mother, my mother who was the first person to make me truly know despair.
